sentence: Republicans this week nominated far-right state Sen. Doug Mastriano to be their gubernatorial nominee in Pennsylvania, where the governor appoints the secretary of state.
title: Trump's bid to control election offices hits first battleground

sentence: Vance, Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano and North Carolina Senate candidate Ted Budd all won their primaries.
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Trump Endorsement More 'Matchbox Car' Than 'Freight Train': Geoff Duncan
